description.value:
Socomec’s three-phase UPS solutions protect data centres, mission-critical IT and light industrial applications where shutdown could jeopardize business operations; they provide a reliable power supply, preventing power outages and disturbances that can lead to loss of service, reduced productivity, equipment damage or safety problems.
Our three-phase UPS  are best in class in terms of efficiency, reliability, flexibility and serviceability; they are the ideal solution for an uninterrupted supply, providing business continuity without compromise.

field_family_sub_title.value: TRANSFER SWITCHING EQUIPMENT FOR SOURCE CHANGE-OVER APPLICATIONS
